description: As a  Software Engineer, you will be an integral part of our high-performing Product Innovation team. You will Craft Exceptional UIs: Specialize in building responsive and thoughtfully designed UIs using React, Typescript, and supporting technologies. Full Development Lifecycle: Participate in all aspects of the software development lifecycle, from estimation and technical design to implementation, documentation, testing, deployment, and support. Web Services Architecture: Build a modern web services architecture to seamlessly integrate with internal and external services and APIs. Collaborative Environment: Collaborate closely with solution architects and developers to transform wireframes and creative designs into functional requirements and a releasable product.Coding Excellence: Uphold strong coding standards for efficiency, readability, and reusability
requirements: Our ideal Frontend React Software Engineer will possess the following qualifications, Collaborative Spirit: You thrive on collaborating with both technical and non-technical team members to create an outstanding user experience. Design Proficiency: Skilled in using modern design tools, wireframes, storyboards, journey maps, prototypes, flow diagrams, etc. Ability to balance user needs with brand guidelines, technical constraints, and business goals.Educational Background: College degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, or a similar field is preferred. Experience: 2+ years of experience in building and maintaining web applications with React, JavaScript, and CSS. Familiarity with software-as-a-service (SaaS) solutions is a plus. Tech Skills: Experience with Typescript, Material UI JSS, MobX, Google Charts, CSS Grid Layout & Flexbox. Proficiency in web standards, modern browsers, responsive design, and the web technology stack. Experience with REST/JSON APIs, Git, and CI/CD tools
responsibility: Collaborate with a dynamic team to develop cutting-edge computer software solutions using Java and web-development languages. Leverage your expertise to enhance the user experience through Java programming, including JavaFX for intuitive interfaces. Employ your proficiency in web development tools and languages, such as Javascript, to contribute to web-based projects. Navigate both MS Windows and Linux environments seamlessly, ensuring compatibility and functionality across platforms. Engage in Android development, utilizing Android Studio to create applications that resonate with our audience.
